sentence: Technology stocks rose this afternoon, with shares of technology companies in the S&P 500 climbing over 1.0%.
In company news, Aware Inc. ( AWRE ) rallied Monday after the biometrics software company said it has licensed several of its products to Certisign to build a cloud-based biometric services platform.
Certisign is the largest supplier of digital certificates in Brazil.
Targeted customers will include banks, retailers, telecoms, healthcare providers, and government agencies, the companies said.
AWRE shares were up just under 10% at $3.21 each, earlier climbing to a session high of $3.42 a share.

(+) PLUG, Seeking Alpha article speculates company could increase revenue by $1 bln if it can convert 100 distribution facility to hydrogen power following Friday's opening of a distribution center at a Home Depot ( HD ) store.
(-) AFFX, Selected to be the genotyping supplier for the Green Super Rice project by the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences.
